title: Interpretation of a dream about conflict with the enemy in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of conflict with the enemy in a dream. Interpretation scholars have given many interpretations that express the interpretation of the dream of conflict with the enemy in a dream, according to the interpretations of scholars and interpreters, and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of the dream of conflict with the enemy in a dream. Interpretation 6 of the dream of conflict with the enemy in a dream. We did not find Specific interpretations to see thatHowever, seeing war in battle and killing a soldier in a dream can indicate success, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees war in a dream, it can lead to overcoming problems, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a young man sees his enemy defeating him in a dream, this may indicate that he He will get into trouble, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about an enemy’s smile in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about an enemy’s smile in a dream could be a sign of good or evil, and God knows best. When an absolute woman sees the enemy’s smile, a sincere smile, it may be a sign of the end of enmity, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about hitting an enemy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about hitting an enemy in a dream can express keeping up. Matters and getting rid of problems, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a divorced woman sees a boy smiling at her in a dream, this may mean that she is getting rid of problems, and God knows best. Also, seeing a married woman and a boy smiling at her in a dream can mean happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about an enemy being sad in a dream. When you see a sad person in a dream, it can be evidence that he has gone through some problems that he suffers from, and God knows the unseen. Where it may indicate His need to help the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of turning an enemy into a friend in a dream. If the dreamer sees your enemy turning into a friend in a dream, he can express peace with the enemy, And God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see shaking hands with the enemy in a dream, it may be a sign that problems with him will end, and God knows the unseen. title: What is the interpretation of seeing high heels in a dream?

preview.html: Hadout website offers you an interpretation of high heels in your dreams. Wearing high heels is one of the things that many women are aware of. Also, many people dream of high heels. Therefore, we present to you, dear followers, all the facts and details of the interpretation of a dream about heels. High for a girl, as well as the interpretation of sleep wearing red high heels for a common woman, as well as silver high heels in a dream. Why dream of wearing high heels for an ordinary woman? The interpretation of seeing a single girl wearing high heels in a dream is complete, is one of the visions that testify to her marriage to a man who has power and a high position in society. Seeing full-sized high heels in a dream speaks of the high status of the man she is marrying. Why does a single woman dream of walking in high heels is a sign of her high status in life and promotion. Why does a girl dream of high heels is a sign that she will achieve high hopes and goals that she is trying to achieve. Why Dreaming of wearing red high-heeled shoes for lonely people is a vision of happiness, joy and good news. Why dream of wearing high heels on a married woman? Wearing high heels for a married woman in a complete dream means that the woman will achieve high and important things in her life. To see high heels in a dream – indicates status High income and promotion for a married woman. Also, seeing a woman wearing high heels in a dream fully testifies to the successes of her children and their successes in life and their arrival to prestigious places. Silver high heels in a dream are complete. The interpretation of seeing silver shoes in a dream while wearing high-heeled shoes is evidence that the dreamer will receive from God On the many desires that he wants. This vision also shows wide support, and many good, benefits and blessings that the dreamer has obtained. Seeing silver high-heeled shoes in a dream is a harbinger of happiness, joy, and the end of experience, sadness, and trouble. This vision also indicates the dreamer’s arrival at Prominent places, work, high status, a sign of strength and power. Why does a single woman dream of high heels? Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing high heels in a single girl’s dream is one of the visions that he generally seeks, in showing kindness and support. Seeing an unmarried woman wearing heels in a full dream is good news that God will grant her a good marriage that will significantly change her life to The best.If a woman sees a bowl full of broken high heels in a dream, this is a sign that she will experience a failed relationship and evidence that her heart is broken.If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: The 10 most famous interpretations of seeing a car battery in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a car battery? Get a huge fortune without much effort. What does buying a new battery mean? We are moving to a new and better home soon. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman running out of her battery? A sign of her impatience due to her husband’s suspicion. What does seeing a car battery being stolen mean? A sign of frustration and despair. Interpretation of seeing a car battery exploding? The dreamer has been exposed to a major calamity or disaster. Do you see the pregnancy battery exploding and the car stopping? An indication of pregnancy and childbirth problems. Interpretation of seeing a broken and repaired car? A guide to getting rid of pregnancy and childbirth problems. Interpretation of seeing a car battery in a dream Seeing a car battery in a dream is a sign of gaining a huge fortune without much effort. When a pregnant woman sees a car battery in a dream, it is a sign of giving birth to a child, God willing. But if an unmarried girl sees a car battery in a dream, it is a sign of her marriage to a just and generous man, God willing. While seeing a new battery in a dream, it symbolizes moving to a new and better home in the near future. Whoever sees a car battery in his dream is evidence of the dreamer’s good qualities, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dying car battery in a dream Seeing a dying car battery in a dream indicates the dreamer’s feeling of deficiency The trick and people's control over him. When a married woman sees that her battery is running out in a dream, this is evidence of her impatience due to her husband's suspicion of her. As for if a widow sees that her car battery has run out, it is an indication that she has overcome hatred and envy. This vision can also indicate in a divorced woman's dream that the time for her confrontation with the divorced woman is approaching, and God knows best. While seeing the battery dead and dying in a dream symbolizes hearing some unpleasant news in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about stealing a car battery Seeing the sleeper stealing a car battery in a dream is a sign of disappointment, despair and disappointment. When a man sees that he has stolen a car battery in a dream, this indicates that his energy has run out and he has lost his passion. As you see a married woman Stealing her car battery in a dream is a sign that her dream has been stolen. As seeing the battery stolen in a pregnant woman's dream is evidence of defeat, and God knows the unseen. While seeing a virgin girl stealing the battery in a dream symbolizes her loss of her efforts, dreams and aspirations, in addition to her feeling of failure. Car battery explosion in a dream Seeing a car battery explode in a dream means that The dreamer will be exposed to a major disaster or catastrophe. When the dreamer sees the battery exploding in a dream, it is a sign that the sleeper will fall into a serious financial crisis in the coming period. While the vision symbolizes the explosion of the car battery in a dream, the dreamer feels deep remorse for the bad deeds he has committed. This vision in a dream may also indicate that he has made many mistakes in his life and needs to work on correcting them. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a battery exploding in a dream is a sign of wrong behavior and bad behavior. The car battery stopped in a dream Seeing a stopped car battery means that the dreamer

title: Interpretation of a dream about hunger according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision: Hunger in an unmarried woman’s dream: An unmarried woman who sees that she is hungry in a dream, this dream shows her psychological state and her need for security in light of the difficult circumstances she is going through. In some cases, hunger in a single woman’s dream indicates the emotional deprivation that she also suffers from a feeling of loneliness And depression. Who do you see in a dream? He eats greedily because he is hungry. This indicates that she is making wrong and random decisions and her inability to control herself. Whoever sees in a dream that he is hungry and has little in front of him, but he has no meat and must eat slowly without haste, then this dream is a sign of the end The problems and troubles he goes through. After a long period of fatigue, as the dream shows an imminent marriage after a long period for the unmarried girl and the fulfillment of her desires, although he is waiting for a long journey, this is the skin to achieve what awaits him. There are those who explained that the hunger of the unmarried indicates the girl’s passion for culture, knowledge, arts and music, This dream shows her passion and love for knowledge and her inability to obtain enough knowledge, culture and arts. As a result of her financial weakness. Interpretation of extreme hunger for a married woman: An unmarried woman who sees in a dream that she feels hungry and misses food. This indicates the difficult days that the dreamer is going through, whether it is a financial crisis or psychological problems and the loss of passion and security with her husband, and it can symbolize the presence of disagreements from Those close to her.Interpretation of seeing hunger for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman feels hungry in a dream. This dream indicates a lack of financial resources and a financial crisis. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing hunger or thirst in a dream as an indication that the baby is a male, God willing.Interpretation of seeing a hungry person in a dreamWho sees In a dream, a hungry person. This dream in a dream indicates that there is someone who needs you and expects benefit from you. In some cases, seeing hunger in a dream indicates greed, flattery, or the presence of a person who has a lot of hypocrisy and envy. Whoever sees his presence in a dream is a hungry stranger and asks you for supplies, so you willingly give him this. The dream indicates the marriage of worries, sorrows and fatigue that you are experiencing and success after loss and removing harm from you. Interpretation of seeing a hungry child in a dream: A hungry infant or child in a dream indicates that he is going through a serious period of anxiety and financial and health problems. But if he sees a hungry child and feeds him in a dream and smiles at him After rumors and games, this dream is a sign of kindness that permeates the dreamer and the fulfillment of all his dreams and desires and success in his life. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing hunger in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will provide You will receive the explanation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing the market in a dream and entering the market in a dream

preview.html: Content: I shop and go to the market for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, I buy clothes and vegetables, I dreamed of walking in the market and did not buy anything according to Ibn Sirin and more. Seeing the markets in the aspects of Hajj, Jihad, interest, humiliation, war, strife, strife, livelihood, order and holidays. And whoever sees the market crowded Going to the market in a dream means that he will succeed in a certain program, but some events and plans will be revealed that will cloud his mind during this period. He is also advised not to compromise his principles. If the dreamer is a business owner, this means that he is making a lot of effort. of effort and will receive material assistance in preparations for someone's family's wedding. The vision also indicates an increase in livelihood and one will spend a life peacefully without facing financial difficulties. The joy of a man who goes to the market in a dream will not decrease, because his days are full of movement and activity. During this period, he will receive good news that will make him rest financially and spiritually. The person who dreams that he is shopping, but if he does not remember what he bought, this means that he will face turbulent days. Also, this noise is good news for preparing for his son’s circumcision or as a wedding or engagement. This vision indicates good developments It makes him anxious and he will not be able to spend a lot of time or share time for himself due to his long and intense working life, but he will not complain about this situation. Returning from the market without a market means that the dreamer with an overly active life will not be able to realize any of his plans because of the change He will constantly make decisions in his life and during this period he will have some conversations that will confuse the person. His mind. And they make him under the influence of others. Whoever sees that he is in the market is a person with a colorful and progressive personality who conducts constant research that claims to develop his personality. Walking in the market is to deliver a message or trust to the knower or the one who saw it so that he can carry it out and preserve it. And they said: What is wrong with this messenger who eats food and walks in the markets? The market is a place for trading, buying, selling and bargaining, which is what he also shows. The concept of the market refers to the market (with the opening of the Seine River), that is, leading people and marketing them to what they want and for their benefit and sometimes to what they do not They want it and are forced to do so. The word market changed to bad (especially if pronounced in this way, especially among the people of the Levant). The market is often a symbol of rebellion, fraud, lies, and insults against God are false. The Messenger’s hadith is well known in the markets: Do not be the first to enter the market, nor the last to leave it, for this contains the devil’s eggs and chicks. The words “bad” and “chick” indicate the strife and whispering that he planted in the minds of the people of that place. Buying cows in a dream, if what they were sold for was fat, is evidence of fertile years, and if they were skinny or emaciated, then they are barren years. The camel market is evidence On the popular foreign store: Buying donkeys is evidence of status. The timber market is evidence of a place where immoral people gather. The horse market is evidence of glory status. The chicken market is protected.

title: What are the implications of dream interpretation of breastfeeding a non-mine child?

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child other than my own: Children are the Creator’s blessing and the joy of life. Love for children is an innate instinct in women and men, so every woman hopes that God will give her a child who satisfies her maternal instinct, to nourish him with her tenderness, but what is the interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child? Who is your child? Is the vision a danger sign or a message of confirmation and good news of good events? In this article you will find all the interpretations mentioned by leading scholars and interpreters. What is the interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a non-infant child? This vision often expresses many happy events that the dreamer will witness in his future, and it also indicates some good qualities that distinguish him, as they appear The good morals that the dreamer is famous for among those around him, as he treats everyone with a good heart and good faith. It also expresses the final mood of this crisis that is still haunting the dreamer for a long time, as he was stuck in a big problem and was looking for a suitable solution, and soon this crisis will end His life will return to what it was. Previous calm. It was. It also indicates the blessing of the Creator - the Almighty - to the viewer with abundant luck and blessings in money, health, and various blessings and good things that he will enjoy soon, so he is one of those with a happy fate. It also indicates that the dreamer has great knowledge and culture, and he also loves to pass on his knowledge to those around him. And he spreads it to everyone. As for the man who is breastfeeding the child, this is evidence that he will regain his health and vitality in the future, after a long period of physical exhaustion, weakness, and bed rest. Seeing a happy and smiling child while breastfeeding portends the dreamer joy and happiness, as it suggests that the Creator will grant him joy. He did not expect it, as a result of his good deeds in this world. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a non-infant child by Ibn Sirin This vision basically expresses the tireless effort made by the dreamer to achieve something he desires to achieve and be rewarded for it (God willing). It also indicates good character and honesty. And the sound heart that the dreamer possesses, which attracts everyone to engage and talk to him about their private secrets. Ibn Sirin considers this vision one of the visions that reassures the soul of an important matter related to the future of the dreamer, perhaps from a social point of view or in his field of work. But it can also indicate A person close to the dreamer pretends to be innocent and kind, but in reality he is exploiting him in the worst way for his own benefit. If the dreamer watches the breastfeeding process, this indicates that God has blessed him with a loyal friend who loves him well and supports him in all areas of his life. What is the interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child who is not my own for a woman? Single? Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child other than my own. This vision shows the girl’s desire to get married and settle down, and to form a family of her own that will make her feel warm and protected by the family and enjoy comfort and tenderness. An unmarried woman who sees that her breasts are producing milk, her vision indicates that she is a high-class human being. Of religiosity. The vision also suggests a fighting and persevering personality, giving her dream a lot of time and physical effort so that she can reach

title: Interpretation of a dream about a person kissing my head in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dreaming of someone kissing my head in a dream is a common dream. Therefore, he evaluated the site. VariousIn this article, the interpretation of dreams about someone kissing my head in a dream, so we know the pros and cons of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone kissing my head in a dream by major interpreters. The interpretation of a dream that someone kisses my head in a dream varies from one person to another, but in general the major interpreters agreed, such as Imam Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Nabulsi, and Imam Ibn Shaheen al-Zahiri agreed that these dreams are among the good dreams, as they generally indicate that benefit is attained by the one who kisses the head of the dreamer. Imam Ibn Sirin said: If the mother is the one who kisses the head of her son or daughter in the dream, then the interpretation This vision is that the dreamer will succeed in his academic and professional life, in addition to the fact that in the vision it is an indication of others’ appreciation for the pioneer because of his high status. If the brother is the one who kisses the dreamer’s head, then the meaning of this dream is the strong relationship that brings the dreamer and his brother together and the basis of love between them. Imam Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi believes that if a person dreams that his close friend is kissing his head in a dream, the meaning of this dream is the dreamer’s need for more support from this person, as he may need financial assistance from him or just standing. Through him in a trial he is going through. Imam Ibn Shaheen interpreted the previous vision as an indication that the dreamer does not feel love, and perhaps because this friend is very close to him, he came in the dream to embody the meaning of love that the dreamer lacks in his life. If the person who kisses your head in the dream is a friend In fact, but there is a rift between you and him at the moment, it is possible that the interpretation of this dream is the return of the water to its course and its end. Of estrangement.Interpretation of dreams of someone kissing my head in a dream could be one of the unwanted interpretations. If the person kissing you is one of your enemies in reality, then this dream shows the deception and hypocrisy to which the person will be exposed. Therefore, he must be careful. If in reality your enemy tried to kiss your head in a dream, but you strongly refused, then the interpretation of this dream is that you will be forced to perform certain jobs and tasks without having a real desire to perform them, in addition to the dream is another indication of the possibility of exposure. The viewer is living in an environment he does not like and with people he is not comfortable with. A man kissing the head of a strange woman in a dream indicates that he has fallen into sin and is far from God Almighty. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of dreams about a kiss on the mouth from someone I know. Click on the image to go to the store and complete The purchase process. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of someone she loves and wants to marry. Interpretation of dreams of someone kissing my head in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees one of her parents kissing her head in a dream, this is a praiseworthy vision indicating that she will fulfill all her family’s rights to obedience and respect to the extent that satisfies her. Her parents about her. If an unmarried girl sees that there is someone kissing her head in a dream, and this person she does not know, then this is a good sign that her wedding is approaching.

title: Green in a dream for a man

preview.html: The green color is a comfortable, happy and calm color for everyone who looks at it, and the green color is a good omen and good news.. Many people know this color as the color of pleasure, happiness and joy, and through today’s theme from our website gptafser.com/ we learn about the green color in a man’s dream Interpretation of seeing the color green in a dream for a single girl. For an unmarried girl to see the color green in her dream is a good omen. It symbolizes that the person she loves will propose to her in the near future, God willing. This dream indicates the person with whom she will marry, complete her life, and also express About their future together. It expresses the many good things and abundance that they will receive. Seeing a single girl wearing a green dress in a dream. This vision shows this girl’s success, excellence, high status, and great importance in her career and studies together. It could be seeing an unmarried girl planting green plants. A sign of psychological comfort. I hope, with optimism and love, that you will attain it very soon, God willing. It indicates the disappearance of worry, grief, anguish, and grief that the dreamer has suffered from for a long time, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing the green color in shoes could be a sign of imminent release. And urgent for all fears, judgments and problems. If an unmarried girl sees herself wearing a green dress in a dream, this may be an indication that she is a respectable, kind, fair and pious girl. This dream symbolizes closeness to Almighty God. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the color red in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation Seeing the color green in a dream for a married woman: A married woman who sees the color green in her dream has this vision. It can indicate the stability and beauty of the marital relationship. This dream indicates that the people of the household are characterized by piety, faith, and piety, and because of this, the dreamer feels comfortable, calm, and tranquil. While I was seeing a woman Married with a green curtain. This dream indicates the great good that the dreamer will obtain in the near future, God willing. This provision may be pregnancy, children and childbirth, and it may be abundant and abundant provision for her and her family. Seeing green curtains in a married woman’s dream. It symbolizes joy and happiness And the joy that will fill her life soon. The vision: This vision paints green walls. It symbolizes the good condition of her and her husband and indicates the high status and position of her husband and the improvement of his financial situation soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the color green in a dream about a man and its meaning: Seeing a green dress or anything else Green in a dream, this dream is a good omen for whoever sees it, God willing. Green is the color of the clothing of the people of Paradise, and seeing it is always good. The green color symbolizes comfort, joy, pleasure, and calm. It indicates the dreamer’s good condition and his closeness to God Almighty by performing all acts of worship to please God Almighty. It expresses This dream is about good faith and reconciliation with oneself because of the green color. See also: The blue color in a dream is a good omen for a single woman. The meaning of seeing the green color in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation.

title: What is the interpretation of cutting onions in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Chopping onions in a dream. The dreams that we see every day in a dream are different, and the interpretation of each dream differs with them. Seeing chopping onions is one of the unpleasant visions for a person, which carries a lot of deception and deception, and this vision has an interpretation close to seeing garlic as well, and in this article we will talk about it. About chopping onions in a dream and what does it mean for the dreamer? Interpretation of chopping onions in a dream What is the interpretation of chopping onions in a dream? A dream about chopping onions can be interpreted with many meanings, but in general, seeing it is considered one of the visions that brings problems to a person. Seeing someone cutting an onion into two halves in his dream confirms He carries a certain secret, but this secret will be revealed and worry him. If a person sees a dry onion in a dream and it is difficult to cut it, this confirms that he will get a little money that is not proportionate to the large amount of his work. Seeing a person cutting an onion and eating it in his sleep is not a good vision. Because it indicates that he has committed some bad deeds that make his family stay away from him. Bread with onions in a person’s dream indicates an increase in his livelihood, but sometimes he carries evil and anxiety if this bread spoils. Roasted onions in a dream are considered warning visions for the pioneer, so if he performs some corrupt actions, he should avoid them and stay away. About her, this is a sign for him from God. What is the interpretation of cutting onions in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing onions is one of the annoying things for the observer, because it is not a favorite food as the Jews demanded, even though they have many other good foods. Onions and cutting them in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller He will reveal the secrets he hides. Onions may indicate the presence and increase of nutrition in a person’s life, but it needs some other meanings to support it in the dream. Ibn Sirin believes that chopping onions can bring goodness to the traveler because it indicates the blessing of this journey and the ease of things. What is the interpretation of chopping onions In a dream about Nabulsi? Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing and cutting onions is interpreted according to some issues related to the dreamer’s character and character. Al-Nabulsi does not see that cutting onions in a dream brings a lot of evil, but it may express some problems that all people face in their lives, but God will make it easier. On the dreamer. Seeing onions in different colors indicates the circumstances that a person is going through in his life. Sometimes he is sad and sometimes he feels relieved, so our circumstances change from moment to moment. Green onions herald the end of conflicts and problems and the beginning of a period of happiness and the end of crises in one’s life. What Still can't find an explanation for your dream? Go to Google and search for the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Chopping onions in a single woman’s dream. Onions in a single woman’s dream confirm some shocking things for her, whether on an emotional or practical level, because it is unpleasant to see them. Chopping onions is one of the things that indicates an association with a bad person, and if If she was engaged, the girl indicates that the engagement will be broken. Seeing a girl standing and cooking food with onions foretells her well-being and good circumstances in this world and the hereafter, and this vision may mean that her marriage is approaching. Onions of a bright color

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a divorced father in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a divorced father in a dream. Seeing dreams can have different meanings, so in the following lines we present the interpretation of a dream of seeing a divorced father in a dream and other details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a divorced father in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of seeing a divorced father in a dream can be a sign of a solution Problems, God willing. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband’s father in a dream, this may be evidence of stability, and God knows the unseen. When she sees my ex-wife’s father in a dream, this may be a sign of a return, and God knows best. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees her ex-husband’s father angry, this may lead to bad Relationships, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife’s sister in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife’s sister in a dream could be a sign of solving problems, God willing. If a man sees my ex-wife’s sister in a dream, it may be a sign of a return, and God knows the unseen, as seeing your wife’s sister may express Previous about a solution to crises, and God knows the unseen. When a man sees my ex-wife’s sister in a dream, it can be a sign of justice, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife talking to me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife talking to me in a dream, it could be a sign of a return, and God knows the unseen. When a man sees a conversation with his wife If a man sees himself talking to his ex-wife in a dream, this may lead to feelings of love for her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife’s mother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife’s mother in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, but seeing my ex-husband’s mother in a dream may be a sign that she is returning to her ex-husband, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband’s mother sad, this may lead to her mother’s dissatisfaction with the divorce, and God is Great, and I know you both that seeing a divorced woman or her ex-husband saying to her Peace may mean respecting the mother of her ex-husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife’s breasts in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife’s breasts in a dream We did not find specific interpretations for seeing this. However, seeing small breasts in a dream could be a sign of a lack of kindness, and God knows the unseen. If he sees The dreamer has breasts in a dream, as this may represent kindness and nourishment, as large breasts can indicate physical changes for the better, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream when I see my ex-wife kissing me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams when I see my ex-wife kissing me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, but seeing a man kissing his ex-wife may be a sign that he is talking about her virtues, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a man sees his ex-wife’s arms, it may be a sign of nostalgia for memories, and God knows best. When a man sees his wife The ex is happy, he can express her happiness after separation, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband shouting at me in a dream.
